question:
Bludy    Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?
A. at the hotel
B. at the beach
C. at the castle
D. at aunt vicky's house​

answers.answer:
bludy
Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?


C. at the castle

Jawaban:

D. at aunt vicky's house

Penjelasan:

Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday.

semoga membantu

related_questions.question: Tolong translatein ke English, mari bersantai setiap hari dengan segelas kopi

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

let's relax everyday with a cup of coffee

Penjelasan:

maaf kalo salah

let's relax every day with a cup of coffee

Mari bersantai setiap hari dengan segelas kopi dalam bahasa Inggris berarti let's relax every day with a cup of coffee

Semoga membantu! jadikan jawaban tercerdas ya

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
(went=past tense of go)
so “we went to the beach 2 weeks ago”
jangan lupa kalau weeknya lebih dari satu pakai “s” (weeks)

related_questions.question:
1. FANI : Mom, can I go camping this weekend with my classmates?    MOTHER: You have a mid-term test on Monday.
A. Certainly
C. I'm sorry you can't.
B. Sure
D. It doesn't matter.​

Mata pelajaran    Kelas
Jumlah siswa
: Bahasa Inggris
: VII (Tujuh)
Direction
Complete sentence with use tobe, am are and is!
1. My mother...... busy
2. Some students...... absent today
3. ...... a student
4. Junior high School of three...... comfortable and clean
5. Stone...... hard​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

What trait

Penjelasan:

Maaf kalo salah yaa

moga bermanfaat yaa

related_questions.question:
A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

related_questions.question:
4. Tito is in the library. His hobby is ....    a, singing
b. dancing
c. swimming
d. reading
molluan to the river to​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. reading

Penjelasan:

4. Tito ada di perpustakaan, hobinya adalah

d. membaca

Jawaban:

d. reading

library= perpustakaan.

Tito is in the library. His hobby is reading.

Tito berada di perpustakaan. Hobinya adalah membaca.

a, singing= bernyanyi

b. dancing= menari

c. swimming= berenang

semoga membantu!

related_questions.question: Bantu jawab ya kaka kaka please​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

  1. saw
  2. went
  3. invited
  4. made
  5. bought
  6. didn't
  7. told
  8. gave
  9. took
  10. watch

Penjelasan:

Jadi, past tense itu tenses yang menjelaskan kalimat di masa lampau, verbs dalam soal tinggal dijadiin bentuk past atau V2.

CMIIW ✨

answers.answer:

Bacaannya mana ya? Soal itu seharusnya ada bacaanya
